entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
